text: It is easier to lead men to combat, stirring up their passion, than to restrain them and direct them toward the patient labors of peace.
author: Andre Gide

text: The pursuit of peace and progress cannot end in a few years in either victory or defeat. The pursuit of peace and progress, with its trials and its errors, its successes and its setbacks, can never be relaxed and never abandoned.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

text: The simplification of life is one of the steps to inner peace. A persistent simplification will create an inner and outer well-being that places harmony in one's life.
author: Peace Pilgrim

text: Complete peace equally reigns between two mental waves.
author: Swami Sivananda
